name: 更新报警类别项

labels.name: story
labels.value: 接口名称：更新报警类别项

parameters.name: caseinfo
parameters.value: {'name': '更新报警类别项', 'base_url': '${get_base_url(base_url)}', 'request': {'url': '/api/v1/alarmtype/update', 'method': 'put', 'json': [{'id': '${get_extract_data(Alarm_Category_Item_ID)}', 'groupID': '${get_extract_data(Alarm_Category_ID)}', 'name': '更新类别项${get_random_number(1,1000)}', 'groupName': '${get_extract_data(GroupName)}'}], 'headers': {'Content-Type': 'application/json;charset=UTF-8', 'X-Project': '${get_extract_data(x_project)}'}}, 'extract': {'Alarm_Category_Item_Name': 'name.0'}, 'validate': [{'equals': {'status_code': 200}}]}
